Text: Tony Award for Best Sound Design:  In 2014, the Tony Awards Administration Committee announced that starting with the 2014-2015 season the Tony Award for Best Sound Design in a Play/Musical would be eliminated.
Triplets:<Tony Award for Best Sound Design

--------------------
<Text: Tony Award for Best Sound Design:  The Tony Administration Committee may bestow a Special Tony Award to a production when it determines that extraordinary sound design has been achieved.>
